verses.verse: עַל־ <WH5921> on מִשְׁכָּבִי֙ <WH4904> on my bed בַּלֵּיל֔וֹת <WH3915> By night בִּקַּ֕שְׁתִּי <WH1245> I sought אֵ֥ת <WH853> שֶׁאָהֲבָ֖ה <WH157> loveth נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> him whom my soul בִּקַּשְׁתִּ֖יו <WH1245> I sought וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> did not מְצָאתִֽיו׃ <WH4672> him but I found

אָק֨וּמָה <WH6965> I will rise נָּ֜א <WH4994> now וַאֲסוֹבְבָ֣ה <WH5437> now and go about בָעִ֗יר <WH5892> the city בַּשְּׁוָקִים֙ <WH7784> in the streets וּבָ֣רְחֹב֔וֹת <WH7339> and in the broad ways אֲבַקְשָׁ֕ה <WH1245> I will seek אֵ֥ת <WH853> שֶׁאָהֲבָ֖ה <WH157> loveth נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> him whom my soul בִּקַּשְׁתִּ֖יו <WH1245> I sought וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> did not מְצָאתִֽיו׃ <WH4672> him but I found

מְצָא֙וּנִי֙ <WH4672> found הַשֹּׁ֣מְרִ֔ים <WH8104> The watchmen הַסֹּבְבִ֖ים <WH5437> that go about בָּעִ֑יר <WH5892> the city אֵ֛ת <WH853> שֶׁאָהֲבָ֥ה <WH157> loveth נַפְשִׁ֖י <WH5315> ye him whom my soul רְאִיתֶֽם׃ <WH7200> me [to whom I said] Saw

כִּמְעַט֙ <WH4592> [It was] but a little שֶׁעָבַ֣רְתִּי <WH5674> that I passed מֵהֶ֔ם <WH1992> like עַ֣ד <WH5704> Until שֶֽׁמָּצָ֔אתִי <WH4672> from them but I found אֵ֥ת <WH853> שֶׁאָהֲבָ֖ה <WH157> loveth נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> him whom my soul אֲחַזְתִּיו֙ <WH270> I held וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not אַרְפֶּ֔נּוּ <WH7503> him and would not let him go עַד־ <WH5704> Until שֶׁ֤הֲבֵיאתִיו֙ <WH935> until I had brought אֶל־ <WH413> about בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house אִמִּ֔י <WH517> him into my mother's וְאֶל־ <WH413> and חֶ֖דֶר <WH2315> and into the chamber הוֹרָתִֽי׃ <WH2029> of her that conceived

הִשְׁבַּ֨עְתִּי <WH7650> I charge אֶתְכֶ֜ם <WH853> בְּנ֤וֹת <WH1323> you O ye daughters יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> of Jerusalem בִּצְבָא֔וֹת <WH6643> by the roes א֖וֹ <WH176> and בְּאַיְל֣וֹת <WH355> by the hinds הַשָּׂדֶ֑ה <WH7704> of the field אִם־ <WH518> you will not תָּעִ֧ירוּ ׀ <WH5782> that ye stir not up וְֽאִם־ <WH518> or תְּעֽוֹרְר֛וּ <WH5782> nor awake אֶת־ <WH853> הָאַהֲבָ֖ה <WH160> [my] love עַ֥ד <WH5704> Until שֶׁתֶּחְפָּֽץ׃ <WH2654> till he please ס

מִ֣י <WH4310> What זֹ֗את <WH2063> likewise עֹלָה֙ <WH5927> Who [is] this that cometh מִן־ <WH4480> from הַמִּדְבָּ֔ר <WH4057> out of the wilderness כְּתִֽימֲר֖וֹת <WH8490> like pillars עָשָׁ֑ן <WH6227> of smoke מְקֻטֶּ֤רֶת <WH6999> perfumed מוֹר֙ <WH4753> with myrrh וּלְבוֹנָ֔ה <WH3828> and frankincense מִכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all אַבְקַ֥ת <WH81> with all powders רוֹכֵֽל׃ <WH7402> of the merchant

הִנֵּ֗ה <WH2009> Behold מִטָּתוֹ֙ <WH4296> Behold his bed שֶׁלִּשְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> which [is] Solomon's שִׁשִּׁ֥ים <WH8346> threescore גִּבֹּרִ֖ים <WH1368> valiant סָבִ֣יב <WH5439> men [are] about לָ֑הּ מִגִּבֹּרֵ֖י <WH1368> it of the valiant יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

כֻּלָּם֙ <WH3605> All אֲחֻ֣זֵי <WH270> They all hold חֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> swords מְלֻמְּדֵ֖י <WH3925> [being] expert מִלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> in war אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> every man חַרְבּוֹ֙ <WH2719> [hath] his sword עַל־ <WH5921> at יְרֵכ֔וֹ <WH3409> upon his thigh מִפַּ֖חַד <WH6343> because of fear בַּלֵּילֽוֹת׃ <WH3915> in the night ס
אַפִּרְי֗וֹן <WH668> himself a chariot עָ֤שָׂה <WH6213> made לוֹ֙ הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> King שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> Solomon מֵעֲצֵ֖י <WH6086> of the wood הַלְּבָנֽוֹן׃ <WH3844> of Lebanon

עַמּוּדָיו֙ <WH5982> the pillars עָ֣שָׂה <WH6213> He made כֶ֔סֶף <WH3701> thereof [of] silver רְפִידָת֣וֹ <WH7507> the bottom זָהָ֔ב <WH2091> thereof [of] gold מֶרְכָּב֖וֹ <WH4817> the covering אַרְגָּמָ֑ן <WH713> of it [of] purple תּוֹכוֹ֙ <WH8432> the midst רָצ֣וּף <WH7528> thereof being paved אַהֲבָ֔ה <WH160> [with] love מִבְּנ֖וֹת <WH1323> for the daughters יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> of Jerusalem

צְאֶ֧ינָה ׀ <WH3318> Go forth וּֽרְאֶ֛ינָה <WH7200> and behold בְּנ֥וֹת <WH1323> O ye daughters צִיּ֖וֹן <WH6726> of Zion בַּמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king שְׁלֹמֹ֑ה <WH8010> Solomon בָּעֲטָרָ֗ה <WH5850> with the crown שֶׁעִטְּרָה־ <WH5849> crowned לּ֤וֹ אִמּוֹ֙ <WH517> wherewith his mother בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> him in the day חֲתֻנָּת֔וֹ <WH2861> of his espousals וּבְי֖וֹם <WH3117> and in the day שִׂמְחַ֥ת <WH8057> of the gladness לִבּֽוֹ׃ <WH3820> of his heart ס
